value.0: Welcome to the Abyss, <race>.  By the look on your face, you must have some questions.
*Sigh* Yes, go ahead....
Those are the wastes, deadly place for an eager <Race> like you to go running around in.
West edge of Zanshibon.  There is a canyon there, beyond that is the wastes.  It was nice knowing you...

Maybe you should brush up on your social skills, you're awful brash and insistent for a guest in this realm.  It takes more than a strong arm or a menagerie of spells to get by in life, I would have thought you'd know that by now.
How should I know?  You were there, I was not.
Am... Amia?  Never heard of it.  Probably some pissant land back on Toril from the looks of you.  Your lands and home are meaningless to me.  Why should I care how you get home?
<StartCheck>[Failure]</Start> I've told you all I care to, begone with you.  You're such a bore..

<StartCheck>[Success]</Start> Well, alright.. If you want to get back to your precious town, you're going to have to find a portal back there.  Portals aren't exactly the most reliable, as you may know already.  There are many portals in many places, the key of course is to find the right one...
<StartCheck>[Failure]</Start> I've told you all I care to, begone with you.  You're such a bore..

<StartCheck>[Success]</Start> Well, alright.. If you want to get back to your precious town, you're going to have to find a portal back there.  Portals aren't exactly the most reliable, as you may know already.  There are many portals in many places, the key of course is to find the right one...

I'd go out into the wastes.  Westwards out of town the canyons stretch forever..  Many portals exist in the wastes, but beware.  As these portals can take you home, many also bring in dangerous creatures from strange places.  You will never know quite what to expect.
What do you want?  Get out of my sight, worm.
Sorry to disappoint you.  But actually I don't.  I'll be going now.
Very perceptive.  Do you mind if I ask you some?
Changed my mind.  I'll be going.
What can you tell me about the area outside this city?
No time, urge to kill rising.... Must leave..
Can I ask you something else?
Yes, deadly indeed.  Which way?
*Leave*
Can't you tell me more?  You aren't exactly too helpful!
How did I get here?
I can see where this is going.. I've things to do, farewell.
Good point.  Can I ask you something else?
How do I get back to Amia?
I guess I'll go find out myself.  Goodbye.
Thanks for nothing there, can I ask you something else?
<StartCheck>[Intimidate]</Start> I think you should tell me what I want to know, or bad things may happen...
*Leave*
But wait!  I have more questions!
<StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start>I'm sure you know more than you're letting on...
*Leave*
But wait!  I have more questions!
Any suggestions?
My thanks for the advice.  Perhaps we will meet again..
Fine advice, mind if I ask you something else?
